content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your electrical service?
Hi Mike! Can you please provide your service address?
Thanks, Mike. Let me confirm your location is within our service area.
Great news! You're in our service area. What day and time would work best for your electrical service appointment?
I’m thinking maybe Thursday morning around 10 AM?
Checking availability for Thursday at 10 AM. One moment please.
I’m sorry, Mike, but it looks like our scheduling system is temporarily down. Would you like me to try again shortly or would you prefer to have one of our team members contact you later?
Hmm, maybe you can just let me know when it’s back up? I’m not in a huge rush to book now.
Understood, Mike. I’ll make a note to follow up once the system is back online. Is there a phone number or email you’d like us to use for the update?
You can just call me at this number, thanks.
Got it, Mike. We appreciate your patience. We’ll reach out once the scheduling system is fixed and can confirm your appointment. Have a great day!
reason: customer chose to wait for system to be back up
